cmd: . ~/init/gcc; curl -L https://sourceforge.net/projects/graphicsmagick/files/graphicsmagick/1.3.25/GraphicsMagick-1.3.25.tar.gz | tar xzf -; cd GraphicsMagick-1.3.25 && ./configure --prefix=/tmp/gm --enable-shared && make DESTDIR=/tmp/gm install; make clean; cd ..; gm display; if [ ! -d ~/.yarn ]; then curl -o- -L https://yarnpkg.com/install.sh | bash; fi; $HOME/.yarn/bin/yarn install ; if [ ! -d ~/apex ]; then curl -sL https://github.com/apex/apex/releases/download/v0.10.3/apex_linux_amd64 -o ~/apex; chmod +x ~/apex; fi; rm -fr apex_linux_amd64; ~/apex deploy
